statements: SELECT * FROM imaging_data ORDER BY date_taken DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, image_filename, date_taken FROM imaging_data WHERE physician_id = 123 ORDER BY date_taken ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, image_type FROM imaging_data WHERE date_taken > '2022-01-01'
SELECT image_filename, physician_id FROM imaging_data WHERE image_type = 'MRI' ORDER BY date_taken DESC
SELECT * FROM imaging_data WHERE physician_id IN (456, 789)
SELECT * FROM imaging_data WHERE date_taken > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_taken DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, patient_id, image_filename, image_type FROM imaging_data WHERE physician_id = 101 ORDER BY id
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(id) AS num_images FROM imaging_data GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_images > 1 ORDER BY num_images DESC
SELECT * FROM imaging_data WHERE image_type IN ('CT Scan', 'MRI') AND physician_id IN (101, 102) ORDER BY date_taken
SELECT physician_id, AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM imaging_data GROUP BY physician_id HAVING avg_id > 500 ORDER BY avg_id DESC
SELECT * FROM ImagingData WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientInfo WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT imaging_type, imaging_date FROM ImagingData WHERE imaging_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientInfo WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender, admission_date FROM PatientInfo WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ImagingData WHERE imaging_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT image_id, imaging_type, result FROM ImagingData WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM ImagingData WHERE imaging_type = 'MRI' ORDER BY imaging_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM PatientInfo WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM PatientInfo WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_imaging_data WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT image_type, diagnosis FROM diagnostic_imaging_data WHERE date_taken > '2022-01-01';
SELECT research_description, researcher_name FROM research_data WHERE research_type = 'MRI';
SELECT patient_id, doctor_name, decision_date FROM clinical_decisions WHERE decision_type = 'Surgery' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT research_id, research_type FROM research_data WHERE date_conducted < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_imaging_data WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT image_id, image_type FROM diagnostic_imaging_data WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY date_taken DESC;
SELECT research_description, researcher_name FROM research_data WHERE research_type = 'Clinical Trial' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM diagnostic_imaging_data d JOIN research_data r ON d.image_id = r.image_id WHERE d.date_taken > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, decision_type, doctor_name FROM clinical_decisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ImagingData;
SELECT Diagnosis, DateTaken FROM ImagingData WHERE PatientID = 100;
SELECT PatientID, PatientName, Gender FROM PatientInfo WHERE Gender = 'M';
SELECT ClinicianName, Specialization, Location FROM Clinicians;
SELECT ResearcherID, ImageID, Findings FROM ResearchData WHERE ImageID = 500;
SELECT * FROM ImagingData;
SELECT PatientID, ImageID, Diagnosis FROM ImagingData WHERE DateTaken >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT ResearcherID, AnalysisResult FROM ResearchData WHERE StudyID = 1;
SELECT ClinicianName, Specialization, Location FROM Clinicians ORDER BY ClinicianName ASC;
SELECT PatientID, PatientName, Gender, Address FROM PatientInfo WHERE DOB < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patient;
SELECT * FROM ImagingStudy WHERE modality = 'CT';
SELECT result_text FROM ImagingResult WHERE result_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT radiologist_name, specialty FROM Radiologist ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT study_date, modality FROM ImagingStudy WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT ImagingStudy.study_id, ImagingStudy.modality, ImagingResult.result_text FROM ImagingStudy INNER JOIN ImagingResult ON ImagingStudy.study_id = ImagingResult.study_id;
SELECT RadiologyReport.report_id, Radiologist.radiologist_name, RadiologyReport.report_text FROM RadiologyReport LEFT JOIN Radiologist ON RadiologyReport.radiologist_id = Radiologist.radiologist_id;

SELECT Patient.patient_name, ImagingStudy.study_id, ImagingResult.result_text, Radiologist.specialty FROM Patient LEFT JOIN ImagingStudy ON Patient.patient_id = ImagingStudy.patient_id LEFT JOIN ImagingResult ON ImagingStudy.study_id = ImagingResult.study_id LEFT JOIN Radiologist ON Radiologist.radiologist_id = RadiologyReport.radiologist_id WHERE Patient.gender = 'Male';
